column4: hi. while trying to install software with apt-get, apt-get also wants to remove software and I have no idea why. Also, the to-be-removed software packages have a {u} after their name. What's going on here and is it safe to proceed? Output: http://pastebin.com/UXCGaPeg
they're probably marked as automatically installed and have no packages that depend on them. since they're all library packages or similar, should be fine to remove
weird, just started that command again and now they don't show up, although I aborted the previous execution.
